Ini yang Disampaikan Presiden Jokowi Saat Bertemu Presiden FIFA
02 Nov 2019, 12:30 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo atau Jokowi menyatakan Indonesia tengah mempersiapkan 10 stadion untuk perhelatan Piala Dunia U-20 pada tahun 2021. Hal itu ia sapaikan saat bertemu dengan Presiden FIFA Gianni Infantino di The Boardroom Hotel Grand Hyatt Erawan, Bangkok, Sabtu.
Kepala Biro Pers, Media, dan Informasi Sekretariat Presiden, Erlin Suastini, dalam rilisnya, mengungkapkan Presiden mengatakan bahwa Indonesia akan menyiapkan stadion yang tersebar di pulau Sumatera, Jawa, dan Bali sebagai lokasi pertandingan.
Sebagai tuan rumah, Indonesia menyambut baik jika Tim Pendahulu FIFA datang untuk berkoordinasi dengan PSSI.
“Kami gembira jika ada masukan, termasuk standar kelayakan stadion dan lainnya. Pendampingan juga telah dilakukan oleh Dewan Olimpiade Asia (Olympic Council of Asia), saat Asian Games 2018,” tutur Kepala Negara saat mengadakan pertemuan bilateral dengan Presiden FIFA di The Boardroom Hotel Grand Hyatt Erawan, Bangkok.
Presiden mengungkapkan bahwa sepak bola merupakan olahraga paling populer di Indonesia dan kini terdapat 1679 klub sepak bola nasional di Indonesia.
Bahkan 77 persen rakyat Indonesia cinta sepak bola dan menempatkan Indonesia sebagai negara pecinta sepak bola nomor dua di dunia.
“Sepak bola adalah sarana memperkuat rasa kesatuan dan kebangsaan rakyat Indonesia. Prestasi dalam sepak bola Indonesia selalu menjadi kebanggaan seluruh rakyat Indonesia,” kata Kepala Negara dalam pertemuan yang digelar sebelum menghadiri sidang pleno Konferensi Tingkat Tinggi (KTT) ke-35 ASEAN di Impact Exhibition & Convention Center di Bangkok, Thailand ini.
Presiden FIFA Infantino menyampaikan bahwa sepak bola bukan hanya sekadar olahraga. “Tapi juga memberikan edukasi, tentang kehidupan, dan juga bagaimana belajar memberikan respek,” kata dia.
Infantino juga menyampaikan bahwa FIFA telah menunjuk Indonesia sebagai tuan rumah Piala Dunia U-20. “Tentunya kami yakin Indonesia sebagai negara besar dengan 267 juta penduduk, dapat menjadi tuan rumah yang baik. Apalagi didukung oleh 200 juta fans sepak bola ini penting bagi kami,” tutur dia.
Presiden menyampaikan apresiasi kepada FIFA yang telah menunjuk Indonesia menjadi tuan rumah Piala Dunia U-20 pada tahun 2021. “Saya ucapkan terima kasih atas kepercayaan menjadi penyelenggara Piala Dunia U-20 pada tahun 2021,” kata Presiden.
Presiden juga mengatakan bahwa pemerintah akan bekerja keras menjamin Piala Dunia U-20 di Indonesia berlangsung sukses dan lancar. "Kami telah memiliki pengalaman dalam menyelenggarakan Asian Games dan juga Asian Para Games 2018,” ujar Jokowi.
Dalam kesempatan tersebut, Infantino juga menyampaikan ucapan selamat kepada Presiden Jokowi karena KLB PSSI telah berjalan lancar dan memilih ketua Umum baru. “Selamat semoga ketua umum yang baru dapat membawa PSSI menjadi lebih baik dan berprestasi,” kata dia. Terakhir, Presiden FIFA juga berjanji akan segera melakukan kunjungan ke Indonesia.
Turut hadir mendampingi Presiden Jokowi, Menteri Koordinator bidang Politik, Hukum, dan Keamanan Mahfud MD, Menteri Koordinator bidang Perekonomian Airlangga Hartarto, Menteri Luar Negeri Retno Marsudi, Sekretaris Kabinet Pramono Anung, Menteri Perdagangan Agus Suparmanto, Duta Besar Indonesia untuk Thailand Ahmad Rusdi, dan Staf Khusus Presiden Fadjroel Rahman.
text:
This is what President Jokowi said when meeting with FIFA President
02 Nov 2019, 12:30 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - President Joko Widodo or Jokowi said Indonesia was preparing 10 stadiums for the U-20 World Cup in 2021. He greeted him when he met with FIFA President Gianni Infantino at The Boardroom of the Grand Hyatt Erawan Hotel, Bangkok, Saturday. .
The Head of the Press, Media and Information Bureau of the Presidential Secretariat, Erlin Suastini, in his release, said that the President said that Indonesia would prepare stadiums that were spread on the islands of Sumatra, Java and Bali as the location of the match.
As the host, Indonesia welcomes the FIFA Predecessor Team to coordinate with PSSI.
"We are happy if there is input, including stadium eligibility standards and others. Assistance has also been carried out by the Olympic Council of Asia (Olympic Council of Asia), during the 2018 Asian Games, "said the Head of State when holding a bilateral meeting with FIFA President at The Boardroom of the Grand Hyatt Erawan Hotel, Bangkok.
The president revealed that soccer is the most popular sport in Indonesia and there are now 1679 national soccer clubs in Indonesia.
Even 77 percent of Indonesians love soccer and put Indonesia as the number two soccer lover in the world.
"Football is a means to strengthen the sense of unity and nationality of the Indonesian people. Achievements in Indonesian football have always been the pride of all Indonesian people, "said the Head of State in a meeting held before attending the plenary session of the 35th ASEAN Summit at the Impact Exhibition & Convention Center in Bangkok, Thailand.
FIFA President Infantino said that soccer is not just a sport. "But it also provides education, about life, and also how learning gives respect," he said.
Infantino also said that FIFA had appointed Indonesia to host the U-20 World Cup. "Of course we are sure that Indonesia, as a large country with 267 million inhabitants, can be a good host. Moreover, supported by 200 million soccer fans is important to us, "he said.
The President expressed his appreciation to FIFA for appointing Indonesia to host the U-20 World Cup in 2021. "I thank you for your trust in being the organizer of the U-20 World Cup in 2021," the president said.
The president also said that the government would work hard to ensure that the U-20 World Cup in Indonesia was successful and smooth. "We already have experience in organizing the Asian Games and also the 2018 Asian Para Games," Jokowi said.
On the occasion, Infantino also expressed his congratulations to President Jokowi because the PSSI KLB had run smoothly and elected a new General Chairperson. "Congratulations, I hope that the new chairman can bring PSSI to a better level of achievement," he said. Finally, the FIFA President also promised to visit Indonesia soon.
Also present accompanied President Jokowi, Coordinating Minister for Politics, Law and Security Mahfud MD, Coordinating Minister for Economic Affairs Airlangga Hartarto, Foreign Minister Retno Marsudi, Cabinet Secretary Pramono Anung, Minister of Trade Agus Suparmanto, Indonesian Ambassador to Thailand Ahmad Rusdi, and Special Staff of President Fadjroel Rahman.
